name: Excadrill
author: PLANETA
flavor_text: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrage
ancient_trait.effect: This Pokémon may attack twice a turn. (If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent’s Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dredge
attacks.effect: Search your deck for 2 Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Mach Claw
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.
